name: !BurnToDie!
description:
!BurnToDie! - Hardcore platformer, in which you will take on the role of a brave cubic hero, who, despite hundreds of traps and obstacles rushed to save his beloved.
Features:
+15 various levels
+Timer system
+More than 15 skins
+2 Locations
+3 Dynamic Songs
+2 Difficulty Modes
+Cool steam achievements
+HardCore Gameplay
